title: Lag should be banned
body: I just had a game and all 4 of my team mates sed they had over 500 ping this should be banned why do i lose a game because my team had lag.

replies.body: Cant tell if serious or taking the piss
I agree. Lag is the devil. It's a terrible feature and should be abolished. . . Riot? What do you have to say about this?
